messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom]  Ashley
messages.msgSnippet: ... Actually Yahoo has been misbehaving for quite some time. (Or maybe just misbehaving with this group?) I ve had a few people explain what they re doing to
messages.messageBody:
on 4/30/03 8:51 PM, Ashley Scholl at ascholl@... wrote:

> please take me off the mailing list. I get 400-600emails a day. I have
> submitted a number of request to have this done. PLease let me know what I
> need to do to have this done.

Actually Yahoo has been misbehaving for quite some time. (Or maybe just
misbehaving with this group?) I've had a few people explain what they're
doing to unsubscribe by email and they're doing it right but Yahoo ignores
them.

That doesn't explain why anyone would then miss the message at the bottom
that gives them my email to write to if they have problems ;-) but it does
explain why some people claim they can't get off the list.

(I removed her from the list, BTW.)

Joyce
Unschooling-dotcom moderator

please take me off the mailing list. I get 400-600emails a day. I have submitted a number of request to have this done. PLease let me know what I need to do to have this done.
Thanks
Ashley
